oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copyprint of Confederate veterans reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This picture of Confederate veterans was taken at the Moore County Courthouse in Lynchburg, Tenn. Pictured are 1st row, from left: Bill Mullins, Claborne Prince, Bill Anderton, William M. Ray, John Bruce, Samuel McDowell, James M. Grammer, Henry B. Morgan 2nd row, from left: Harrison H. Neece, Kin Bobo, Mike Milsap, Jim Bickley, Tom Driver, Milford Grammer, J. H. Baxter, George Dance, Frank Allen. The African-American man, George Dance, was a doctor's helper with the Confederate army.
